Ted Hawthorn

Found Language

A reactionary approach to understanding the philosophies of the city. This work seeks to present the perception of urban space through language structures � highlighting the ways the city thinks for us, and speaks with us. Disfigured images collected from February - May 2025, using a portable wand scanner. 2 silkscreen prints 87 page publication Hand-painted 'd�tourner' & 'in psychogeographic state' signs
